customer_name: D M B Dream Ventures L L C

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:10 pm on
08/08/2016.
Inspector arrived at the facility at 1:10 pm and spoke with a household member who stated that no one over 18
years of age was available for the inspection.

narrative:
